title: 【ミラー】State of Playみんなで観よう！同時視聴！ぺこ！【ホロライブ/兎田ぺこら】
name: Usada Pekora

entries.text: I need you guys to listen to the audio on that side.
There's not much I can do-peko.
It'll probably echo since I have two windows open...
I really want you to hear it.
Since I streamed at this time.
No, seriously, I only went to sleep a few hours ago, so...
I honestly can't tell if I slept or not.
I'll go back to sleep once this is done.
I'll sleep until it's time for the gym.
But I wonder what new title is coming?
I just saw that *something* was happening...
And thought I'd do a watchalong if I could.
I haven't done a morning stream in a while...
I seriously don't have any info.
If anything, you guys probably know more than me.
Since a new *Detroit* game never comes...
The guy who played Connor reacted to this stream or something.
I heard whispers like, "Is there a chance for a sequel?!"
I mean, I don't know for sure though.
I haven't actually seen his reaction myself, so...
But people in the search were saying "Maybe it's happening?!"
So I was like, "Oh? Is it?!"
Pekora's finally picking up on things.
Will the choices change, I wonder?
Pekora's brain might finally be working.
My head was in a fog.
I kept thinking, "What am I even saying?" while doing it.
I debated it for a second.
Should I start without sleeping, or sleep first?
But I was like, "If I don't sleep, I'm doomed."
If I watched while sleepy, nothing would sink in.
I bet people heading to work are awake right now.
Are some people already out and about?
Well, some people have work on Saturday too, I guess.
I wonder if students are waking up now?
Can I get a one-chance line?
Is it the start of the week?
Someone told me, "Here you go, Pekora-san."
I was like, "Eh? What's this?" at first.
I was thinking, "Did I do anything to deserve a gift?"
Then they said it was chocolate.
I hadn't prepared anything because I didn't think I'd get any.
I talked about those expensive cookies I recommend.
800 yen. A cookie that's 800 yen per piece.
I was like, "I wanted to give you these!"
I'll give them one next time.
I'm sure the shops have them today.
But I don't know where the shop is located!
What's gonna come out? What is it?
Every time I look at these comments...
Some people are like "Can't wait! Can't wait!"
"Eh, it's gonna be the same as usual this year, right?"
Ah, wait, this is the Japanese stream...
But there are overseas guys here.
Even though there's an English stream.
It'll start the moment the clock strikes.
The video will probably start right away.
What do you want to see?
Eh, I don't know what that is.
Is it like a crystal spirit vibe?
The art style is cute. The art...
Actually, now that you mention it...
Oh, looks like there's a variety of weapons.
That last one looked like an axe.
Eh, really? Wait, I didn't know.
Was it super popular overseas? Was it popular in Japan?
I wish I'd known about it, at least.
So I can play it on Steam.
In the chat on the other side...
Some people are saying *Kena* was fun.
I guess I just need to learn about it now.
FORLOOP? I might not have heard of that.
What kind of guy is he?
The route is decided by the team's vote.
That looks kinda fun, doesn't it?
It hasn't been searched at all.
It'd be weird if it wasn't online.
Ah, if you have teammates, you just return to base.
Ah, and at the end there...
Do you defeat that cube thing at the end?
It's not PvP, is it? Isn't it different?
"We aim for an experience where everyone gets hype every time you play."
Eh, honestly, I kinda wanna try it.
"The loop continues until you save the world."
Is there gonna be a separation?
The BGM gets a bit sad at times.
No way it's a crying game.
This is definitely the type where you cry.
I played as that handsome guy the whole time.
But seeing him like this, yeah, he aged.
Eh, I'm looking forward to that.
It's probably that, before the release...
Pekora's gonna show off her trash aim again, isn't she?
Certainly, it's because it's a controller.
It says it's a remaster of a game from 2003.
He looks like a monster, but is he the protagonist?
It feels kinda like an American comic.
Fans must be super happy about this.
I don't usually play games like this.
My brain probably couldn't keep up.
Crap, I absolutely can't do strategy games.
I think I'd be bad at it. I suck at them.
Oi, if you touch those beams, isn't that bad?
Someone asked, "Why don't you play fighting games?"
I suck at them because I don't practice.
Eh, that blonde girl is cute.
I tried my best as Sarah, but...
It's amazing how all these companies...
Did they save something for the end?
Just seeing a huge boss like that makes me want to play.
Just from looking at it now...
It feels like something Pekora would like.
Disaster... If I have this disaster prevention...
My head's gonna explode trying to understand this.
Did he just take poison damage?
Like in *Sekiro* when you extend the thing...
There's no string, but the movement feels like that.
I can't tell where the ground is anymore.
Eh, how do you fight? Is it aerial combat?
But he's not attacking the big guy?
I'm losing track of what's happening.
"We know the location of the Resonant."
"Long ago... Tonight, to save human history..."
Can you play co-op with two people?
Well, maybe it's expected, but everyone...
Fighting huge things... Ah, gameplay mechanics.
Does this have a stagger gauge?
Eh, isn't this gonna happen eventually?
That grass thing is gonna go berserk, isn't it?
Woah, I might not have seen this.
I feel like I've seen it, but also haven't.
I feel like I've seen it somewhere.
The disc version is in June.
Don't show scary stuff like that.
From tomorrow... machine... try the demo?
The protagonist is pretty small so...
Pekora actually... likes this kind of thing.
No, they totally saw you just now.
Strong enemy... do you just run?
"This world does not belong to thee."
What kind of game is this?
That's kinda funny, a chicken is the protagonist?
Opened up some weird dragon-looking thing.
We're doing insects and monkeys too.
If you crash, is it over?
It's super famous, but I've never seen any of the movies.
It's probably the type of movie I'd like.
Hey, there's absolutely a genre Pekora likes in there.
I just haven't had the chance to watch them.
Is it live action? Live action.
Is it *Goemon* live action for the win?
Whoa, what? What are they bringing us?
Man, I wanna play *Metal Gear* again.
Didn't it say 40th Anniversary just now?
Wah! I know the name, but I've never played it-peko!
Ah, he's not in *Smash*? Ah, really?
Is it easy to play? For beginners?
Taimo? Is it a horror game?
Did she come back from the sea?
Was she floating in the sea again?
Isn't that the thing patients wear?
I wonder what illness she had.
Wah, we don't know when yet.
I might have never played *Silent Hill*.
Is he redoing a bad ending?
Is it that thing where if you touch the rain, you turn yellow?
Well, people have different definitions of justice.
But there's an enemy making this rain fall.
Maybe it's that person called the Queen.
Is it coming out this year?
Konami has become amazing, thinking about it.
I thought *Kingsman* for a second, but...
Now that you say it, I see it.
You'll show us at the end, right?
Seriously, it looked like a movie.
Game graphics are basically live action now.
"From here on, the rain will begin."
But it feels like there are actual people.
Defeat people if you find them.
In March? Is it a demo?
"I'll play if I feel like it."
What kind of attitude is that?
That's what someone who won't play says.
Pekora has only seen the beginning of *Spider-Man*, so I don't know.
There's a black one, Venom, too.
Eh, isn't there only one Spider-Man?
Seriously? Did Spider-Man become a group?
Does he know where they are to move like that?
Is this a game where you blast monsters?
Every time you die, the instructor...
Every game is just fighting, fighting.
I guess everyone just loves fighting, huh?
I feel like that's the case.
You die, get stronger, and beat the guy who killed you.
What if you intentionally cause an eclipse?
"The eclipse corrupts everything in the world."
Whoa, it means you can see the monsters.
There are unexpectedly a lot coming soon.
Whoa, that thing on the back looks like hair.
Says there are lots of character costumes.
Fighting games really are releasing all sorts of stuff.
It got quiet all of a sudden.
He looks like a super nice guy.
He has a really nice voice, doesn't he?
Is he a voice actor or an actor?
He looks just like an actor, the way he uses expressions.
A story that shakes your heart, *God of War*.
Wow, amazing, we can do that?
"A saga of destruction and... what is this? Atonement."
Do it for 2 or 3 hours! Come on!
That's what I'm looking forward to most.
I was kinda hoping for *Dragon's Dogma*.
I haven't played *Peace Walker*, so I want to try it.
I'm curious about *Metal Gear Collection Vol. 2*.
But I never got around to it.
The artificial-looking person had a red tag.
"Priority 1. Feature: Vitals unstable. Severe injury," it says.
She did have an IV drip though.
Suffering from some kind of disease?
I like that kind of stuff.
There are a lot of heavy ones.
Yeah, some people have work starting.
Thanks for hanging out with me since morning.
Pekora is going to sleep a bit after this.
Then gym, work, and I think I'll stream tonight.
Thank you for watching with me today.
See you in the next stream.
